name: Finley Dress
description:
The perfect summer dress, great for a day at the park, beach or Grandma's! 

* Comfy, cute and seasonless. To wear in the spring layer a short sleeve tee underneath. Wear alone in the summer. To wear in the fall/winter layer a long sleeve shirt underneath and leggings.

* Stretchy (so it will fit longer) 

* Can also work as a skirt or a shirt over pants/shorts.

* Tie straps can easily be adjusted.

Sizes:

0-6 months: 12 inch length
9-12 months: 14 inch length
12-18 months: 15 inch length
18-24 months: 16 inch length
2T: 17 inch length
3T: 18 inch length
4T: 19 inch length

*** Sizes 5-8 are available for an additional charge - contact me to set up a listing for your size. 

5: 20 inch length
6: 21 inch length
7: 22 inch length
8: 23 inch length

** Please indicate size.

All of my handmade clothing comes with a boutique label sewn on the outside hem and a hang tag. Made with love in my smoke and pet free home studio.

Please allow 7 to 10 business days to complete your garment construction.

name: Messenger Bag
description:
Custom made messengar bag created in your choice of fabrics.  Bags can be made in 4 different sizes.

Small 13 X 15
Medium 15 X 17
Large 17 x 19
X-Large 19 x 21

Contact me to find out what's available or leave a message about your style in the Note to seller box.

name: Elyse Top
description:
Custom made drawstring top for women. Buttons can be used if requested for an additional $5.00. This tunic top is great for all seasons. You can wear it sleeveless or with a tee shirt or even a long sleeve tee under it. The top is flattering for all body types. Constructed using high quality cotton fabrics in your choice of color combos. Fabric is prewashed to prevent shrinking. 

BE SURE TO MENTION SIZE IN NOTE TO SELLER AT CHECKOUT. 

Sizes
SM 6
MD 8
LG 10/12
XL 14

If you are a combination of sizes please give me your bust measurement and your desired shirt length and one can be made to fit you! 

Contact me to find out what fabric is available or leave a message about your style in the Note to seller box.

name: Clara Dress
description: The Clara dress is made using the Frog Legs and Pony Tail Pattern.  A great year round dress for little girls!  Wear it alone in the summer, with a tee shirt in the spring and long sleeves and tights in the fall and winter.  All dresses are custom made for you!  You tell me the colors/patterns you would like and I do the rest.
